entry.question: How does Soldier's Blaster (and similar cards) work when interacting with a character who is both an Autobot and a Decepticon?
entry.answer: Different faction means "does not share a faction identity." For a character which is both an Autobot and a Decepticon, "not sharing a faction identity" means NOT Autobot and NOT Decepticon. Currently, this leaves Mercenary as the only different faction.
